experience.description: At MossPark, worked on the development of a Single Page Application (SPA) for Collision Conf 2024, focusing on delivering a dynamic, high-performance, and user-friendly interface. Designed an engaging landing page to clearly communicate MossPark's value proposition and attract more users. Additionally, contributed to the development of LumeDot's web and mobile app using React Native, enabling users to read and listen to audiobooks. Integrated CI/CD pipelines to automate deployment and ensure smooth updates, improving development efficiency and reducing downtime.

At Sas Proaplicaciones, worked on multiple projects involving full-stack development using Golang, React.js, Hugo, and MySQL/Postgres to build scalable and efficient web applications. One of the key projects was the development of a stock donation platform, where Golang was used for backend API development and React.js for frontend design. The platform featured user-friendly interfaces for stock selection, transaction preferences, and real-time stock valuation. It also incorporated secure user authentication, data encryption, and seamless communication with financial APIs, ensuring safe and efficient transactions. Additionally, developed a chatbot for Donorbox using OpenAI API, which was trained on the organization's internal database to provide real-time donation-related assistance. The chatbot was designed to retrieve data from database tables dynamically, improving donor engagement and customer interactions. Another major contribution was designing and developing a dynamic content management system (CMS) using Golang and Hugo, enabling automated static site generation from structured data. Developed RESTful APIs in Golang to fetch and process MySQL database records, dynamically populating Hugo-compatible markdown (.md) files for content generation. Structured Golang structs were implemented to map database records for pages like About, Services, and Contact, ensuring scalability and easy content updates. Automated content deployment using Hugo templates, optimizing site performance and reducing manual updates.

Creating new features, functionality, and capability on the sites using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Bootstrap. Implemented websites, mobile applications, and landing pages from concept through deployment.
Worked as an Intern and implemented a new responsive, mobile-first approach which increased mobile traffic by 20%.
Collaborated with product team members to implement new feature developments.

education.university: Dev Bhoomi Group Of Institutions And Technology

education.description: Computer Fundamentals, Database Management Systems, Object-Oriented Programming, Operating System
